column5: Hey everyone.  Friend and are (or were) planning on going out on Pigeon on Monday - but have heard a rumor that some of the lakes up there already have ice on them?  Anyone know if the Launch at Nogies Creek is open?  Any help would be great.  Sorry for the short notice.
Give Smith and Sons bait store a call.  They may be able to help you.

Not sure how the north end is, but the southern end of all kawartha lakes ive seen are frozen as far as I can see. Sturgeon, pigeon, chemong, and scugog. It was -15*c last night, it made a lot of ice.
Upper Buckhorn is pretty much frozen.
gross. Hope to get out one more time before season closes. Gonna need some warmer weather for that to happen. Even down on st c the water is 32.5 my buddy tells me who went yesterday
My guess frozen unless there’s significant current
Weather here next week is -2/3 over night, +3/6  day time highs for the week. Picked a great week to be off on the river Rog.  Hope you get out atleast 1or2 more times bud.
You could probably launch in bobcaygeon.
